#REDIRECT [[Block#List of blocks]]

This page serves as a full list of all the 1036 [[block]]s that are currently in ''Minecraft'', including:
*193 [[wood (disambiguation)|wood]]-related blocks
*253 [[stone (disambiguation)|stone]]-related blocks
*37 [[ore feature|ore]]-related blocks
*181 nature-related blocks
*65 [[nether]] blocks
*14 [[end]] blocks
*36 utility blocks
*31 [[redstone mechanics|redstone]]-related blocks
*199 colorful blocks
*31 [[unobtainable resource|unobtainable]] blocks
Blocks from April Fools' snapshots, Education Edition and removed blocks are not listed here.
